name: Famlympics
description:
This game is a simple online leaderboard competition. The objective is to "scare" all the sheeps to enter the "safe zone" within the fences.

This was our first game and game jam. Obviously everything is pretty raw, but the experience was amazing <3.

Credits:

3D artist: Thomas Toniolli

Developers: Anthony Toniolli and Guilherme Afonso Muchon

UI Designer: Taís Ertl

Music: Bensound.com (menu) and FreeMusicArchive (game)
